title: Phase 5: Hardening and Release
description: Run quality gates, performance and accessibility passes, security validation, and production readiness checklist.

title: Establish mandatory quality gate scripts
description: Ensure check/lint/test/build scripts are defined and enforceable in CI and local workflow.

title: Run performance and accessibility pass
description: Audit key pages for performance and accessibility and remediate high-impact issues.

title: Validate security and permissions across surfaces
description: Review auth/session handling and role checks for public, wiki, and admin surfaces.

title: Prepare production readiness checklist
description: Create and execute release checklist including observability, fallback plans, and rollback verification.

title: Fix WhatsApp OG image preview for landing page
description: WhatsApp preview is not showing OG image reliably. Replace OG image with compressed web-safe asset under 600KB and update metadata tags to improve crawler compatibility.
close_reason: Updated OG image tags to absolute URL for WhatsApp crawler compatibility test

comments.author: ayamkv
comments.text: Try absolute OG image URL for WhatsApp crawler compatibility

title: Phase 4: Card Data Integration
description: Integrate finalized card schema, migration from temporary attributes, public card browsing, and admin card CRUD with taxonomy links.

title: Create migration path from temporary card attributes
description: Design and run migration from attributesRaw schemaVersion model to finalized card schema.

title: Implement public card list and detail pages
description: Build /cards listing and detail routes backed by finalized card data structures.

title: Finalize card schema integration in backend
description: Implement finalized card domain schema and enforce validation rules in backend models and APIs.

title: Build admin card CRUD and taxonomy linking
description: Implement dashboard card management and linking to element, semesta, and island taxonomies.

title: Phase 1: Design System and App Shell
description: Build global layout, navigation, design tokens, reusable base components, and shared loading/error/empty states with GSAP motion boundaries.

title: Document GSAP motion boundaries and reduced-motion policy
description: Define allowed animation patterns and reduced-motion defaults to keep UX consistent and accessible.

title: Define design tokens and reusable base components
description: Establish typography, color, spacing, and component primitives aligned with shadcn-svelte usage.

title: Add shared loading, error, and empty states
description: Implement reusable states for async pages and data-bound screens across public and dashboard routes.

title: Build global app shell and navigation
description: Implement shared layout, navigation, footer, and route-level shell behavior for public and admin surfaces.

title: Landing: add logo parallax above card
description: Implement subtle logo parallax linked to pointer movement while keeping motion restrained, mobile-safe, and reduced-motion compliant.
close_reason: Implemented locked card/floating tilt with micro-depth and hover-linked logo effects

comments.author: ayamkv
comments.text: Adjust parallax implementation to floating card logo layer

comments.author: ayamkv
comments.text: Fix floating logo interaction direction and overlay rendering issues

title: Landing: add card edge glint sweep interaction
description: Add a subtle idle edge-glint sweep animation on the landing card that pauses or reduces intensity during active hover/touch states and respects reduced motion.
close_reason: Added idle edge glint sweep with interaction pause and reduced-motion fallback

title: Landing: fix base card hover flicker from pointer reset jitter
description: Card hover flickers because pointer tracking resets to center intermittently while interacting. Move pointer event handling to stable wrapper, compute tilt against card rect, and reset only on wrapper leave/touch end.
close_reason: Moved pointer handling to stable wrapper and removed reset jitter flicker

title: Landing: add second holo duplicate overlay for experimentation
description: Add a second card holo duplicate layer with independent blend/tint/opacity variables so visual stacking can be tuned experimentally without altering core card interactions.
close_reason: Added second holo duplicate layer with tunable variables and states

title: Landing: add cinematic tilt intro and brighter mobile dot field
description: Improve landing intro by animating card tilt settle sequence before interaction unlock, and brighten dotted background appearance on mobile screens.
close_reason: Added cinematic tilt intro sequence, mobile-brighter dotted background, and card/floating fade-in loading transitions

title: Workflow: Beads-First Delivery
description: Enforce beads-first workflow, hook installation, and session-close protocol in docs and daily practice.

title: Install and verify beads git hooks
description: Install bd hooks and verify pre-commit/post-merge/pre-push behavior is active for this repository.

title: Remove tracked artifacts from repository (forward-only)
description: Delete tracked files under artifacts/ from git index and keep artifacts/ ignored going forward without rewriting git history.

title: Update WORKFLOW.md with mandatory beads-first process
description: Document required flow: bd ready/create -> claim in_progress -> code -> close issue -> bd sync -> git push. Add no-work-without-bead rule and session close checklist.

title: Landing: reactive dots, Instagram CTA, and logo visibility fix
description: Add cursor-reactive dotted background, add Instagram link below card with icon, and fix logo visibility race while preserving current loader/intro/card interactions.
close_reason: Implemented and pushed cursor-reactive dots, Instagram CTA, and logo visibility fix

title: Phase 0: Platform Baseline
description: Prepare production-ready baseline for auth, backend, and deployment conventions (Convex, Better Auth, Cloudflare R2, env standards, and protected routes).

title: Wire Convex project and environment configuration
description: Initialize Convex in the app, define local/dev/prod env variables, and verify basic function deployment path.

title: Integrate Better Auth with Convex and role scaffolding
description: Implement Better Auth integration compatible with Convex and establish baseline roles (admin, editor, contributor, viewer).

title: Implement dashboard route protection strategy
description: Add route guards for protected dashboard routes and verify role-based access behavior for unauthorized requests.

title: Build Cloudflare R2 upload proof-of-concept
description: Implement signed upload flow to R2 and persist media metadata in backend storage for admin uploads.

title: Phase 3: Wiki Authoring and Admin
description: Add TipTap authoring, draft/publish workflow, revision history baseline, and admin media library backed by R2.

title: Integrate TipTap editor for wiki authoring
description: Add TipTap editor with a minimal extension set for structured wiki authoring in admin routes.

title: Add revision history and rollback baseline
description: Track content revisions and provide rollback capability for wiki entries.

title: Build admin media library backed by R2
description: Add media browser/upload management in dashboard with metadata persistence and validation.

title: Implement draft and publish workflow
description: Support draft and published states with admin workflow controls and publish safeguards.

title: Phase 2: Wiki Read Experience
description: Implement public wiki list and detail pages with search/filter, SEO metadata, and related content blocks.

title: Implement wiki index route with filter/search baseline
description: Create /wiki route with list view, category filters, and baseline search UX.

title: Add SEO metadata and social preview for wiki pages
description: Generate title/description/OG metadata for index and detail wiki pages with share-safe defaults.

title: Implement wiki detail route and related content blocks
description: Create /wiki/[slug] route with structured article rendering and related content module.
